title: E155 - Broderick Bownds
text:
Hello! My name is Broderick Bownds and I am a junior engineering major at Harvey Mudd College with a focus of Electrical and Computer Engineering. I am passionate abotu designing efficient systems at the intersection of hardware and signal processing. My experience spans FPGA development, system-level design, CAD-based prototyping.
Beyond the lab, I am committed to inclusive innovation, such as redesigning neuroimaging caps for textured hair, mentoring youth in 3D design and coding through Project Think, being involved in NSBE, and leading through the Annenberg Leadership Forum.
